New Records: Shohei Ohtani hit 50 home runs in a single season
Shohei Ohtani had 10 RBI in a single game
Shohei Ohtani went 6-for-6 in a single game
Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani scored the first run of the game with a stolen base and a sacrifice fly
Shohei Ohtani hit a two-run single in the second inning
Shohei Ohtani hit a two-run double in the third inning
Shohei Ohtani hit a two-run home run in the sixth inning
Shohei Ohtani hit a three-run home run in the seventh inning
Shohei Ohtani hit a three-run home run in the ninth inning
Pre-Game Insights: The game was the second of a three-game series between the Los Angeles Dodgers and the Miami Marlins
Post-Match Reflections: MLB Commissioner Rob Manfred congratulated Shohei Ohtani on his achievement
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Los Angeles Dodgers secured their place in the playoffs with the win
Others: The game was played on September 19, 2024
